settings.title: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.description: Find answers to the most common questions about our products, shipping, and returns.

settings.question: How long does shipping take?
settings.answer:
We offer several shipping options:

  • Standard Shipping: 3-5 business days
  • Express Shipping: 1-2 business days
  • Overnight Shipping: Next business day

All orders placed before 2 PM EST ship the same day.

settings.question: What is your return policy?
settings.answer:
We offer a 30-day return policy on all items. To be eligible for a return:

  • Items must be in original condition
  • Tags must be attached
  • Original packaging required
  • Receipt or proof of purchase needed

Return shipping is free for exchanges or defective items.

settings.question: Do you ship internationally?
settings.answer:
Yes! We ship to over 50 countries worldwide. International shipping rates and delivery times vary by destination.

Please note that international customers are responsible for any customs duties or taxes that may apply.

settings.question: How do I track my order?
settings.answer:
Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can:

  • Click the tracking link in your shipping confirmation email
  • Visit our order tracking page and enter your order number
  • Log into your account to view order status

Tracking information is typically updated within 24 hours of shipment.

settings.question: What payment methods do you accept?
settings.answer:
We accept all major payment methods:

  • Credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover)
  • PayPal
  • Apple Pay
  • Google Pay
  • Shop Pay

All transactions are secure and encrypted for your protection.
